main_definition: In the context of computers, 'desktops' refers to powerful personal computers designed primarily for general office work or gaming.

meanings_and_examples.example: He has a few desktops in his home office.

meanings_and_examples.definition: General-purpose personal computers for work or gaming
meanings_and_examples.example: The latest desktop models have improved graphics and processing power.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Desktop publishing software used to create documents with text, images, and layout
meanings_and_examples.example: She uses Adobe InDesign, a popular desktop publishing tool, for creating professional-looking brochures.
